thread.title: Geoffrey Zakarian cooks up a production company | Page Six
thread.title_full: Geoffrey Zakarian cooks up a production company | Page Six

author: Page Six Team
title: Geoffrey Zakarian cooks up a production company | Page Six
text:
Food Network star Geoffrey Zakarian , who hosts “Cooks vs. Cons,” is ready to take a bigger bite out of TV.
The celebrity chef is launching Corner Table Entertainment, a development and production company, with Key Group’s Jaret Keller.
They will produce unscripted and scripted projects about food and lifestyle for TV and digital. CTE is producing his SiriusXM show “Food Talk,” airing from Miami during the South Beach Wine & Food Festival, with guests such as Todd English , Jean-Georges Vongerichten, and Anne Burrell.
